data.name: CategoryFilter.Help
data.value: Category filter allows you to filter envents by categories

data.name: LocationFilter.Help
data.value: Location filter allows you to filter envents by locations

data.name: DateFilter.Help
data.value: Event date filter allows you to filter envents by dates

data.name: EventModules.Help
data.value: Retrive data from chosen event modules, leave it blank to retrieve data from all modules in this portal

data.name: DefaultCategory.Help
data.value: Enter the full name of the default category you wish to choose. Leave is blank to choose all categories. Please note the deafult category only applies when the category filter is visible
